news.title: Trump budget chief Vought ramps up criticism of Powell, vows investigation into Fed renovations
news.summary: Office of Management and Budget Director Russell Vought spoke Friday to CNBC's "Squawk Box" Vought: "We're going to have to work together to find a way to get things done"

news.title: Trump announces 35% tariffs on Canada starting Aug. 1, warns of higher levies if Ottawa retaliates
news.summary: President Donald Trump announced a 35% tariff on Canadian imports, starting Aug. 1. It is the latest letter to a trade partner that threatens high rates.

news.title: Goldman Sachs is piloting its first autonomous coder in major AI milestone for Wall Street
news.summary: The arrival of agentic AI at Goldman Sachs, in which programs don't just help with tasks but execute complex jobs, signals a shift on Wall Street.

news.title: FDA to consider drug affordability when granting new vouchers to speed up approvals, Makary says
news.summary: It is unclear how the Trump administration will consider affordability when reviewing a drug. Prices are usually determined after an approval in the U.S.

news.title: Bitcoin flies to new all-time highs, topping $118,000 as institutions pile into ETFs
news.summary: Bitcoin and ether ETFs saw their second biggest day of inflows ever. Investors built on this week's rally and pushed prices to new records overnight.

news.title: How some pros use options to trade Nvidia and other tech stocks while limiting risk
news.summary: With Nvidia’s stock at record highs, some investors might be wary of buying. Options strategists suggest other ways to play the name.

news.title: Jorts and ‘quiet’ western wear are helping Levi’s stave off the impact of tariffs
news.summary: “With the 90s and Y2K fashion in full swing, longer and looser-style shorts are in high demand,” Levi’s CEO says.

news.title: The new $40,000 cap on SALT deductions in Trump’s big bill aids homeowners most in these states
news.summary: Home prices could creep up in high-tax areas as more home buyers seek to benefit from the SALT deduction. Home prices could also rise in high tax areas if more people seek to take advantage of the tax break.

news.title: Why Robinhood’s stock is falling while crypto peers and bitcoin surge
news.summary: Robinhood’s stock is falling while those of other crypto-related companies are rallying. Florida's attorney general launched an investigation into the company's Robinhood Crypto subsidiary.

news.title: AMC’s stock is climbing, lifted by Wedbush’s upgrade amid an improving box office
news.summary: Wedbush turned bullish on AMC’s stock, citing a more consistent movie-release slate over the next several quarters and prospects for market share gains.
